message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $11,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested but $11,500 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $10,500 is a bit too low for me to consider. Could you do $11,000?
Hi Alice, I'm trying to keep my budget closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
